name: Super Javelin!
description:
Super Javelin is a game about throwing javelins as far as you can!

Customise your character and compete against your friends and family, or some of the various AI characters! 

Can you reach the top of the leader board?

  • Up to 4 players!
  • Local high scores!
  • Button mashing!
  • Different skill level AI!
  • Customizable characters!

Tweet me a screenshot of your best throw  @JRoberts_Games!

Just one more throw.....
